A wonderful classic, I still love it no matter how many times i've played it

such a fun classic game the graphics may not be up to todays standards but i've definetely seen worse. the puzzles are really interesting may not be a long game but i loved replaying it. definetely reccomend. when i get the money i'm gonna get portal 2

Awesome concept, stimulating puzzles, great story (for a puzzle game), and I really love the humour in the dialogue (monologue)
Portal 1 & 2 are the meaning of "A Perfect Game Design".
好玩，很有游戏性，就是有点晕
An awesome game that everyone should try. Great controls. Great gameplay. Ok story. A really great game.

Very Good I mean it's made by Valve they always have the good stuff
note:even it says 2 hours I finished it.

Portal e Portal 2 são com certeza os melhores jogos de puzzle já feitos, mecânicas inovadoras e uma história muito boa com ligação com os jogos Half-Life, porém com uma mistura de mistério e humor, personagens marcantes e engraçados, 
Lançado originalmente em outubro de 2007 (incrível como se passou tanto tempo assim). O jogo chamou a atenção de muita gente pelo seu gráfico que ainda e de impressionar até hoje e principalmente com a sua mecânica de brincar com portais e física do jogo para resolver diversos puzzles.
Jogo recomendado para todos , muito barato, com ele vocês vão conhecer um pouco da Steam e porque ela é tão grande hoje e também vão se divertir demais.
Not just another mindless shooter. Requires some creative thinking to play and that's what makes it fun and worthwhile.
Сплошной балдёж, прошёл игру с большим удовольствием
Good end song 9/10 hurts my brain
I felt that Portal 1 had a darker tone compared to Portal 2
This game is really amazing. Portal is definitely a unique game. Even though I am late for the party I can confidently say that this game brought something new to gaming. 9/10. Enjoy the Cake ;)
Отличная игра, хорошие головоломки сопоставленные с сюжетом и атмосферой
the 3th best game i bit of bugs but the best
This is a good game to play. :)
juegazo, divertidisimo y buenardo, terrible corto, un 7

Without a doubt one of the best games ever. It is also really short (i completed it in 7 hours) and cheap so come on, just buy it. the atmosphere is subtly chilling and it's use of physics and momentum is brilliant. Buy it, or I will make you

You'll likely have issues running the game. I had to put map_noareas 1 in the console to stop the constant freezes with audio stuttering.
